draw_explain: 纠缠的树根与岩石的融合体现了'无法分离'的核心概念，超现实的蓝光增强视觉记忆。根须缠绕的细节和地质纹理暗示长期不可分割的关联，奇幻风格强化记忆点。
draw_prompt: Surreal closeup of glowing tree roots fused into stone boulders, intertwined veins and rock cracks glowing blue, mystical atmosphere, hyperdetailed botanical textures, dark earthy tones with azure highlights, fantasy art style
